epitaph.title: Witch's Epitaph
epitaph.1: Behold the sweetfish river, running through my beloved home of old.
epitaph.2: You who seek the Golden Land, follow its path downstream in search of the key.
epitaph.3: As you travel down it, you will see a village.
epitaph.4: In that village, look for the shore the two speak of.
epitaph.5: There the key to the Golden Land sleeps.
epitaph.6: You who laid hand upon the key must journey as follows to the Golden Land.
epitaph.7: On the first twilight, sacrifice the six chosen by the key.
epitaph.8: On the second twilight, those who remain shall tear apart the two who are close.
epitaph.9: On the third twilight, those who remain shall praise my noble name.
epitaph.10: On the fourth twilight, gouge the head and kill.
epitaph.11: On the fifth twilight, gouge the chest and kill.
epitaph.12: On the sixth twilight, gouge the stomach and kill.
epitaph.13: On the seventh twilight, gouge the knee and kill.
epitaph.14: On the eighth twilight, gouge the leg and kill.
epitaph.15: On the ninth twilight, the witch revives, and none shall be left alive.
epitaph.16: On the tenth twilight, the journey ends, and you shall reach the Home of the Gold.
epitaph.17: The witch shall praise the wise, and bestow four treasures.
epitaph.18: One shall be all of the Golden Land's gold.
epitaph.19: One resurrects all the dead people's souls.
epitaph.20: One even revives all the love they possessed.
epitaph.21: And one for the witch to eternally rest.
epitaph.22: Rest in peace, my beloved witch, Beariche.

home.title: Home
home.description: Welcome to our multilingual React application
home.welcomeMessage: This is a modern React application with multi-language support and client-side routing.

about.title: About
about.projectDescription: This is a multilingual React application example built with modern frontend technology stack.

notFound.message: The page you are looking for might have been removed, renamed, or is temporarily unavailable.
